item.title: Rail conductor struck and killed by a train in Montana
item.description: Authorities are investigating the death of a BNSF Railway conductor who was hit by a passing train, the NTSB said.

item.title: Amazon Web Services outage affecting many major apps, websites worldwide

item.title: Louvre robbery leaves Paris' iconic museum shuttered for a second day
item.description: The Louvre museum was hit by a brazen daytime jewel heist, forcing the Paris institution to close its doors for a second day in a row.
